also after you uninstall firefox you should clear out anything in /usr/lib/mozilla-firefox/ that is leftover
those are per user and stored in your home directory
uninstalling it via Synaptic deleted the directory
/usr/lib/mozilla and /usr/lib/firefox both?
also check ~/.mozilla/plugins and make sure nothing is in there
is there an easy way to delete them via the file manager? or must I use a command from the terminal?
you will need to be root to do it, you can just sudo rm -f /usr/lib/mozilla/ ; rm -f /usr/lib/firefox ; rm -f ~/.mozilla/plugins/
